docs_sm.$description: Small font size for documentation purpose only. Do not used this token/figma text style in your BIT project. It references directly the primitive font size tokens, not reacting to responsive changes.

docs_md.$description: Medium font size for documentation purpose only. Do not used this token/figma text style in your BIT project. It references directly the primitive font size tokens, not reacting to responsive changes.

docs_lg.$description: Large font size for documentation purpose only. Do not used this token/figma text style in your BIT project. It references directly the primitive font size tokens, not reacting to responsive changes.
